private.title: 100% Private & Secure
private.description: All time calculations are done locally in your browser. No tracking, no data collection, ensuring complete privacy.

global.title: Global Coverage
global.description: Track time in major cities across all continents. From Seoul to New York, London to Sydney, access 100+ cities worldwide.

realTime.title: Real-Time Updates
realTime.description: Live clock display with automatic updates every second. Always shows accurate local time for all selected cities.

save.title: Save Your Cities
save.description: Your selected cities are automatically saved in your browser. No need to re-add them every time you visit.

search.title: Easy Search
search.description: Quick city search with timezone offset display. Find any city instantly with our intuitive search interface.

free.title: 100% Free Forever
free.description: No registration required, no limits. Track unlimited cities and timezones completely free with all features.
